description: From Latin collȳrium, from Ancient Greek κολλύριον (kollúrion, “poultice”).

nouns.description: collyrium (countable and uncountable, plural collyria or collyriums)

entries.meaning: A lotion or liquid wash used as a cleanser for the eyes; an eye-salve.
Loosely, any product applied to or around the eyes; kohl.
examples: […]  there were rings of collyrium about her eyes.
